name: ctwr-web
description: CivicTech Waterloo Region Website - A modern, accessible, and performant static site built with Jekyll

scripts.lint:yaml: echo 'YAML files found:' && find . -name '*.yml' -o -name '*.yaml' | grep -v node_modules | grep -v _site | grep -v vendor | wc -l && echo 'YAML linting skipped - using basic validation'
scripts.lint:json: find . -name '*.json' | grep -v node_modules | grep -v _site | grep -v vendor | grep -v package-lock.json | xargs jsonlint
scripts.lint:shell: find scripts -name '*.sh' -exec shellcheck {} \; 2>/dev/null || echo 'Shellcheck not available, skipping shell linting'
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:html && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:js && npm run lint:md && npm run lint:yaml && npm run lint:json && npm run lint:shell
scripts.format:all: npm run format:html && npm run format:css && npm run format:js && npm run format:md && npm run format:yaml && npm run format:json
scripts.minify:css: cleancss -o css/style.min.css css/style.css && cleancss -o css/abstract-shapes.min.css css/abstract-shapes.css
scripts.minify:js: terser js/custom.js js/meeting.js js/click-scroll.js js/magnific-popup-options.js --compress --mangle --source-map -o js/bundle.min.js
scripts.minify: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js && npm run minify:optimized
scripts.build:prod: npm run minify && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.test:security: npm audit && bundle exec bundler-audit check --update
scripts.test:smoke:serve: timeout 10s npm run serve || echo 'Serve test completed'
scripts.test:smoke:all: npm run test:smoke:build && npm run test:smoke:html && npm run test:smoke:css && npm run test:smoke:js
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:accessibility && npm run test:security && npm run test:smoke
